Asif Sattar wrote:
> Great tip Joe, thanks!  Just one question about it, my
> printstream variable is a global private static one.
> Therefore, once it's set in the log rotation method it gets
> used in the other methods.  If I were to pass it in as a
> parameter what changes should I make to make sure the same
> reference is maintained?

I'm not sure what you mean. What are you worried would break? Could you 
write a test for that?
